title: George Carlin - 1997-07-27 Artpark, Lewiston, NY
description:
George Carlin
Artpark
Lewiston, NY
July 27, 1997

Taped and mastered by }{eywood
Transfer from 1st gen cassette by Bones420
Lineage: Cass (1) > Cool Edit 2.0 (wav @ 16/44.1) > flashdrive > plugin enhanced Adobe audition 1.5 (WNS, EQ, peak limiting, splits & fades) > Xrecode II (flac 8)

Taped from the lawn in front of the open-faced mainstage with a recorder I have no memory of.  The master cassette disappeared many years ago, and I had thought the show was lost, but Bones420 recently informed me that he still had his copy, a 1st gen from my master.  To top that off, he had already transferred it to digital wav file.  Presto, the file as in my hand and I was reliving a moment in my life I had thought was gone forever. Thanks, Kev.

A mix of material from his previous couple of HBO specials "You Are All Diseased and Back In Town.  I went through the scripts for these shows and titled the tracks on this show to match what is on the official releases as much as I could.


01 Intro
02 People I Can Do Without
03 Phrases
04 Capital Punishment 
05 State Prison Farms
06 Little Things We Share
07 Farting In Public
08 Self Promotion
09 Sexuality
10 Feminist Blowjob
11 Naming Things
12 Free Floating Hostility
